item.title: Ranil meets John over crossover claims; John Amaratunga may cross to SLFP in a bid to make his Son-In-Law Dinesh Weerakkody as the next Chairman of NDB-DFCC Merged Sri Lanka's largest Bank in Present regime?
item.dc:creator: StockGuru
item.description:
Opposition Leader Ranil Wickremesinghe summoned UNP MP John Amaratunga for a meeting today over his recent trip to the Middle East with President Mahinda Rajapaksa, reports said.
Wickremesinghe sought a clarification from Amaratunga over media reports that he had sat with the Government delegation for bilateral talks in Jordan when he was allowed to go only to visit religious sites.
When asked about the meeting Amaratunga told the Colombo Gazette that he briefed Wickremesinghe on his Middle ...

item.title: Crude oil prices rises from its lows
item.dc:creator: Octopus
item.description:
https://finance.yahoo.com/new
The Brent North Sea crude oil price for January delivery recovered to $US66.75, up 56 US cents from Monday night's close, after hitting $US65.29 a barrel during Tuesday night's session.
The benchmark West Texas Intermediate (WTI) price for January also hit the lowest level since 2009, reaching $US62.25 a barrel. It later stood at $US63.70, up 65 US cents from Monday night's close.

item.title: Stock Chart Analyzing
item.dc:creator: suranga.oshadi
item.description:
Chart Analyzing ගෑන පොඩ්ඩක් කියලා දෙන්න පුලුවන් ද?
කොහොමද එවා පාව්ච්චි කරන්නේ කියලා.

කොහොමද ඒවායෙන් වෑඩක් ගන්නේ කියලා

item.title: How to Make Money In Stocks - a Winning System
item.dc:creator: Padonrup
item.description:
Guys, please refer below points which are really good when selecting stocks to buy. This was published by William J. O'Neil in his book "How to Make Money in Stocks - A Winning System in Good Times or Bad".
1. Current quarterly earnings per share; They must be up at least 20%
2. Annual earnings per share; They should show meaningful growth for the last five years.
3. Buy companies with new products, new management, or significant new changes in their industry conditions. And most important, ...
